posts.post_title: ******Attention T213 Type 2 Collectors...Will Be Breaking Near SGC Set..See Below****
posts.post_content:
I will listing a near set with variations on Ebay. Reaching out to members first...Please email me with needs list, upgrades..etc.

Thanks. Gary
[url]NEWVENTR1@AOL.COM[/url]

Just a small plug for Gary, although he shouldn't need it.  I bought some of these T213s from him and they are all that.  Nice and crisp but often plagued by the T213 curse of non-paper-breaking wrinkles that drive down the grade.
I seriously doubt you will be disappointed.
Todd is spot on, Gary is a pleasure to deal with.

Gary,

card arrived today. the card exceeds expectations. thanks
